comments.body: Are you sure the second argument is `region_name`? [This documentation](https://boto3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/core/boto3.html) would seem to indicate that everything but the name is a **kwargs, so it would need to be named -- i.e., `region_name= region_name`.

Ah -- I see it now, it is actually the second argument from [here](https://boto3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/core/session.html#boto3.session.Session.client). Since it has a default value of None, would you mind adding the explicit `region_name= region_name` anyway, just to be 100% obvious?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +58,62 @@    :return:
    """
    sage_client = boto3.client('sagemaker', region_name)
    ecr_client = boto3.client("ecr")
    repository_conf = ecr_client.describe_repositories(
